content.text:
# Edward Kibbe

Edward Kibbe (c.1611â€“1694) was an early settler in the Massachusetts Bay Colony and an early resident of Dorchester, Massachusetts. He is regarded as the ancestor of the Kibbe/Kibbey family in New England.
Biography
Kibbe is believed to have immigrated from England by 1639. He appears in Dorchester town and church records during the mid-17th century. His wife is unidentified in surviving documents.
Kibbe died in November 1694, with his death noted in colonial records from Massachusetts and Connecticut.
See Also
* Ephraim Kibbey
